welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Schleswig, a charming city known for its rich history and breathtaking landscapes. We invite you to immerse yourself in our culture and discover all the beauty this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schleswig-jagel Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Schleswig-jagel Airport, primarily serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
